Verse.Text: نتوان ز چشم شوق رمید اے ہلال عید از صد نگہ براہ تو دامے نہادہ اند بر خود نظر گشا ز تہی دامنی مرنج در سینۂ تو ماہ تمامی نہادہ اند

THE NEW MOON OF EID You cannot manage to evade the eager view of people waiting for a sight of you. A thousand glances have conspired to weave a net to catch you in. Open your eyes to yourself. Do not grieve that you are a bare outline. Within you lies a real full moon. (Translated by M. Hadi Husain)
